channel.title: Chronological modelling on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in Chronological modelling on open-archaeo

item.title: ADMUR
item.description: Tools to directly model underlying population dynamics using chronological datasets (radiocarbon and other) with a variety of models, including Continuous Piecewise Linear (CPL) model framework, and model comparison framework using BIC. Package also calibrates 14C samples, and generates Summed Probability Distributions (SPD). CPL modelling directly estimates the most likely population trajectory given a dataset, using SPD simulation analysis to generate a Goodness-of-fit test for the best selected model.

item.title: aion
item.description: Provides a system of classes and methods to represent and work with time-series.

item.title: allen-relations
item.description: Allen relations from Bayesian calibration: R function to compare two indefinite intervals produced by a Bayesian calibration using the Allen algebra.

item.title: aoristAAR
item.description: A R package for the aoristic analysis of archaeological data.

item.title: aoristic
item.description: R package for aoristic analysis; the goal of aoristic is to make sense of temporally vague data.

item.title: ArchaeoChron
item.description: Bayesian Modeling of Archaeological Chronologies.

item.title: ArchaeoPhases
item.description: Tools for the post-processing of the Markov Chain simulated by any software used for the construction of archeological chronologies.

item.title: ArchaeoPhases
item.description: Post-Processing of the Markov Chain Simulated by ‘ChronoModel’, ‘Oxcal’ or ‘BCal’.

item.title: archchron
item.description: For handling archaeological chronological data.

item.title: archSeries
item.description: Frequency time-series tools for archaeology.

item.title: CeramicApportioning
item.description: A method for chronological apportioning of ceramic assemblages that considers site occupation dates, ceramic production dates, and popularity distribution curves.

item.title: chronochrt
item.description: Building chronological charts easily with R.

item.title: ChronoLog
item.description: A tool for computer-assisted chronological research.

item.title: chronomodel
item.description: Chronological Modelling of Archaeological Data using Bayesian Statistics.

item.title: Chronophage
item.description: Applications for obtaining chronograms (quantified chronology diagrams) and time distribution curves of archaeological or historical units from quantified dating indicators treated as inaccuracy intervals.

item.title: chronos
item.description: Provides a system of classes and methods to represent and work with such time-series.

item.title: chronup
item.description: Tools for chronological uncertainty propagation.

item.title: clam
item.description: A package for classical age-depth modelling of cores from deposits.

item.title: coffee
item.description: Uses Bayesian methods to enforce the chronological ordering of radiocarbon and other dates.

item.title: datplot
item.description: Converting date ranges into dating ‘steps’ eases the visualization of changes in e.g. pottery consumption, style and other variables over time. This package provides tools to process and prepare data for visualization.

item.title: dplR
item.description: Perform tree-ring analyses such as detrending, chronology building, and crossdating.

item.title: fellingDateR
item.description: Compute and combine felling date estimates for historical tree-ring series with (incomplete) sapwood.

item.title: GeoChronR
item.description: An integrated framework that allows scientists to generate state-of-the-art age models for their records, create time-uncertain ensembles of their data, analyze those ensembles with a number of commonly-used techniques, and visualize their results in an intuitive way.

item.title: juliandate
item.description: Simple conversions between Julian Dates and Julian/Gregorian calendar dates, supporting ancient dates.

item.title: kairos
item.description: Analysis of Chronological Patterns from Archaeological Count Data.

item.title: katun
item.description: Tools for converting between Maya and Western calendars.

item.title: maya-calendar
item.description: Tools for converting between Maya and Western calendars.

item.title: measuRing
item.description: Identification of ring borders on scanned image sections from dendrochronological samples.

item.title: oxcAAR
item.description: A collection of functions that can be used to execute OxCal from within R.

item.title: Plum
item.description: Uses a Bayesian approach to construct age-depth models for 210Pb data.

item.title: PyPlum
item.description: Creates age-depth models using 210Pb data and autoregressive gamma process.

item.title: rbacon
item.description: A package for Bayesian age-depth modelling of sediment cores, constrained by prior information on sedimentation rates and their variability.

item.title: recmod
item.description: Tools for estimating parameters for Radiocarbon-dated Event Count (REC) Models.

item.title: ringdater_pkg
item.description: Statistical and visual crossdating annually resolved data (e.g. tree rings or mollusc and fish otolith growth increments).

item.title: rock-art-transfer-learning
item.description: Reconstructing rock art chronology with transfer learning

item.title: Seriographe EPPM
item.description: The EPPM serograph is a graphical tool for chronological serialization of archaeological furniture counting tables.

item.title: shoredate
item.description: Offers methods to shoreline date Stone Age sites located along the Norwegian Skagerrak coast based on their present-day elevation and the trajectory of past relative sea-level change.

item.title: stratigraphr
item.description: R package for archaeological stratigraphy and chronological sequences.

item.title: timeperiod2daterange
item.description: Converts time period entities to standardised date ranges.

item.title: TPQ-Composer
item.description: Utility for graphically displaying a set of termini post quem induced from stratified archaeological artifacts.

item.title: unstruwwel
item.description: Detect and Parse Historic Dates in R.

item.title: UThwigl
item.description: Compute closed- and open-system uranium-thorium (U-Th) ages of geological and archaeological samples.

item.title: xDateR
item.description: Shiny app for interactive crossdating of tree-ring data.
